## Summary
What changed and why?

## Scope
- [ ] Single-purpose PR (no mixed concerns)
- [ ] No local artifacts committed (e.g., Lighthouse HTML)
- [ ] No dependency changes unless required and justified

## Verification
- [ ] `npm ci`
- [ ] `npm run build`
- [ ] Routes verified (if applicable)
- [ ] Diagrams rendered (if diagrams changed)

## Risk
What could break? What is the rollback?
